DataElement.preferredName: Metastatic Neoplasm Confirmed Diagnosis Method Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Free text field to specify the name of the method used to establish or verify identification of a tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site that is not already specified or mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to established or verified identification by signs and symptoms of malignant tumor spread from an original (primary) site to another location in the body.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology.

Property.preferredDefinition: Confirmed; having been established or verified.:The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal._Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Curated for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg 10/2010 sw

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg (JP) 12/2010. Modified definition to replace system generated with human readable format per approval by Tara. mc 7/2/11
